Dischrony is a community around chronic diseases with a strong focus on science and personal health.
Dischrony is a driven community of people of all levels of experience and expertise with a shared interest of understanding, preventing, and fighting chronic diseases.
The community is hosted on Skool, a platform designed specifically for educational communities.
Enjoy a game-theoretical incentive system that rewards good posts and punishes spam and noise.
Looking for something you read years ago? Old posts remain accessible through a well-designed search function.
The community is much more than feed of posts. It includes event calendars, classrooms, and more.
Compete in the community leaderboards by writing great posts that help or inspire others.
The mission is to accelerate the science of chronic disease. The community has no barrier to entry; it is completely free.
